original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary:
"FDA Warns Against Consumption of Radioactive Shrimp Imported by Walmart Supplier"

"The US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has issued a warning against a certain brand of frozen raw shrimp, imported by Indonesian firm PT. Bahari Makmur Sejati (BMS Foods) and distributed under Walmart’s Great Value label, due to potential radioactive contamination. The FDA detected cesium-137 in a shipment, and while no contaminated product has entered American stores, authorities have urged caution."</s>
